item.description:
INFORMAL DISCUSSION MEETING/ DEMO

 

Hi Everyone......  Kind of short notice but what can I say I am having a craving for some fast food, food court stuff!  I am inviting everyone to join me for this informal time to meet.  Time for people to see hang out with others with similar interests and time for people who havent been active in the group to come out and meet others in a casual informal friendly setting.  (We are friendly in other settings too!) 

The goal is to get together, have some food and meet as a group to discuss/chat about our common interests in hypnosis and nlp.  I will have a few examples of hypnosis and nlp-topics ready to get people talking if no one wants to get things going.  Really it is open.  You would be suprised one one person in the group can share that could benefit everyone and that is a good thing!  I will probably have a demo or two ready just to make it all interesting/exciting.  It could be nlp language pattern....rapid hypnosis induction....examples of rapport or mirroring, etc et.  You will have to wait and see!  

So come on out and dine with me and others (if you dont want to eat that is fine too).....  you might want to shop and drop in and meet some wonderful people!  

I hope to see many of you!  

Chris Adshade
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet at the front of the food court. (I will be wearing a bright orange tshirt--ya cant miss me!)

group.name: The Greater Boston NLP and Hypnosis Meetup Group

item.name: Informal Meeting/Discussion/Demo
